item.title: BUCK Houdini Pipeline
item.description: Pipeline When I was first hired at Buck in 2019, one of the things I expressed interest in and that they wanted was tools to make using Houdini easier. Before I started my work, Buck had no Houdini pipeline. I established a global HSITE and turned it into a git-based respository which allowed me to make changes which propagated across all the studios around the globe. I converted any the local ‘houdini.

item.title: Form
item.description: Having recently got a 3D printer, I became really interested in creating one virtually in Houdini. There are a few different approaches, just like there are in real life. What’s great is being able to break the constraints of technology and do any made-up method you want. I chose lasers because lasers are SWEET. Custom Slicer The first thing I did is try to slice up a 3D model into lots of layers, as 3D printers do.
